examples.korean: She sat there, sipping at her tea. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 거기 앉아서 차를 홀짝거리고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: All the usual local notables were there. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 늘 보는 지역 유지들 모두가 거기 와 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: All the usual local notables were there. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They seemed to be resentful of our presence there. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 우리가 거기 가 있는 것에 분개하는 것 같았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They seemed to be resentful of our presence there. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You can buy brushes, paint, varnish and suchlike there. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 거기에서는 붓, 페인트, 니스, 그러한 것들을 살 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You can buy brushes, paint, varnish and suchlike there. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She looked so forlorn, standing there in the rain. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 거기 빗속에 서 있는 모습이 너무도 쓸쓸해 보였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
